messages.content: AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What is the component for phone number?
For the phone number, we use phone-number-input. This component defines a telephone numbers field using a JSON structure. This component is only used to input valid Rwandan phone number.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of phone-number-input

{"key":"PHONE_NUMBER","type":"phone-number-input","selected":true,"templateOptions":{"textlabel":"Phonenumber","required":true,"placeholder":"Enterphonenumber","maxLength":10,"summarySection":"APPLICANT_DETAILS"}}
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are options that can be used in templateOptions?

'textlabel': It is required. The label of this input element.
 'placeholder': It is required. The placeholder of this input element
 'maxLength': It is not required. The maximum number of characters allowed on the input. Usually used when the inputType is number.
 'minLength': It is not required. The minimum number of characters allowed on the input. Usually used when the inputType is number.
 'label': It is required. The label of this input element. 
 'required': It is not required. Set input to required. 
 'summarySection': It is required. The summary section to which the input value will be allocated after submission.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What component will I use for an international phone number?

We use intl-phone-number-input. This component defines an international telephone numbers field using a JSON structure. It adds a flag dropdown to any input, detects the user's country, displays a relevant placeholder and provides formatting/validation methods.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of intl-phone-number-input

{"key":"PHONE_NUMBER","type":"intl-phone-number-input","className":"col-lg-3col-md-3col-sm-12col-xs-12","selected":false,"templateOptions":{"label":"TextPhone","required":true,"summarySection":"APPLICANT_DETAILS"}},
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are options that can be used in templateOptions?

'label': It is required. The label of this input element.
 'required': It is not required. Set input to required. 
 'summarySection': It is required. The summary section to which the input value will be allocated after submission.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What is the component for adding space between two components?
We use a key called SPACE. This is a display field component that is used to add space between other component in the form.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of space
{"key":"SPACE","required":false,"className":"col-12"},
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What is the component for location?

For location, we use the location widget. This widget field is used to list all available location addresses in Rwanda. It fetches the list of provinces, district, sector, cell and village from the database.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of the location widget

{"key":"APPLICANT_PROVINCE_OF_RESIDENCE_SKIP","type":"location","className":"col-lg-6col-md-6col-sm-12col-xs-12","templateOptions":{"limit":"VILLAGE","start":"PROVINCE","required":false,"isSubLabel":false,"selectable":true,"includeRwanda":false,"fetchedPropertiesToPrefill":[{"originKey":"locationProvinceFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_PROVINCE_OF_RESIDENCE"},{"originKey":"locationDistrictFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_DISTRICT_OF_RESIDENCE"},{"originKey":"locationSectorFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_SECTOR_OF_RESIDENCE"},{"originKey":"locationCellFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_CELL_OF_RESIDENCE"},{"originKey":"locationVillageFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_VILLAGE_OF_RESIDENCE"},{"originKey":"locationProvinceFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_PROVINCE_OF_RESIDENCE_NAME"},{"originKey":"locationDistrictFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_DISTRICT_OF_RESIDENCE_NAME"},{"originKey":"locationSectorFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_SECTOR_OF_RESIDENCE_NAME"},{"originKey":"locationCellFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_CELL_OF_RESIDENCE_NAME"},{"originKey":"locationVillageFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"APPLICANT_VILLAGE_OF_RESIDENCE_NAME"}]}}
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are options that can be used in templateOptions?

'label': It is required. The label of this input element.
 'start': It is required. Location input to start from.
 'limit': It is required. Location input to end from.
 'isSubLabel': It is not required. Add a label on this input field, works together with the title attribute.
 'title': It is not required. Add label when isSubLabel is set to true. 
 'required': It is not required. Set input to required. 
 'selectable': It is required. Display the input starting from province level. 
 'includeRwanda': It is not required. To remove or add Rwanda to the country list. 
 'fetchedPropertiesToPrefill': It is not required. The properties in the form to prefill. 
 'summarySection': It is required. The summary section to which the input value will be allocated after submission.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What values can start and limit accept?

COUNTRY = 'COUNTRY'
 PROVINCE = 'PROVINCE' 
 DISTRICT = 'DISTRICT' 
 SECTOR = 'SECTOR' 
 CELL = 'CELL' 
 VILLAGE = 'VILLAGE'
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What is the component for RIB offices?
For RIB offices, we use the rib-offices widget. This widget field is used to list all RIB Offices in Rwanda. It fetches the list of the offices from the database.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of the rib-offices widget

{"key":"PROCESSING_DISTRICT_SKIP","type":"rib-offices","selected":false,"className":"col-lg-6col-md-6col-sm-12col-xs-12","templateOptions":{"required":true,"placeholder":"Selectdistrict","summarySection":"","fetchedPropertiesToPrefill":[{"originKey":"locationDistrictFormControl.value.location.guid","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_DISTRICT_ID"},{"originKey":"locationDistrictFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_DISTRICT"},{"originKey":"locationSectorFormControl.value.location.guid","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_SECTOR_ID"},{"originKey":"locationSectorFormControl.value.code","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_SECTOR"},{"originKey":"locationDistrictFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_DISTRICT_NAME"},{"originKey":"locationSectorFormControl.value.name","targetFieldKey":"PROCESSING_SECTOR_NAME"}]}},
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are options that can be used in templateOptions?

'label': It is required. The label of this input element.
  'required': It is not required. Set input to required. 
  'fetchedPropertiesToPrefill': It is not required. The properties in the form to prefill. 
 'summarySection': It is required. The summary section to which the input value will be allocated after submission.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What is the component for upi information?
We use the upi-fetch widget. This widget is used to fetch upi information of land parcel.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
Give me usage example of the upi-fetch widget

{"key":"UPI","type":"upi-fetch","className":"col-lg-2col-md-2col-sm-12col-xs-12","templateOptions":{"required":true,"summarySection":"LAND_DETAILS","representativeId":"1199870099836251","identificationType":"NATIONAL_IDENTIFICATION","integrationApiVersion":"2.0","fetchedPropertiesToPrefill":[{"originKey":"upi","targetFieldKey":"UPI"},{"originKey":"location.district.districtName","targetFieldKey":"PARCEL_DISTRICT"},{"originKey":"location.sector.sectorName","targetFieldKey":"PARCEL_SECTOR"},{"originKey":"location.cell.cellName","targetFieldKey":"PARCEL_CELL"},{"originKey":"location.village.villageName","targetFieldKey":"PARCEL_VILLAGE"},{"originKey":"landUse","targetFieldKey":"LAND_USAGE"},{"originKey":"rightType","targetFieldKey":"TENURE_TYPE"}]}}
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are options that can be used in templateOptions?

'label': It is required. The label of this input element.
 'placeholder': It is not required. The placeholder to this input element
 'representativeId': It is required. The representative id used in the api to fetch the upi.
 'identificationType': It is required. The identification type used in the api to fetch the upi.
 'integrationApiVersion': It is required. The integration api version to fetch the upi from. The default is 1.0 
 'required': It is not required. Set input to required. 
 'enableRFA': It is not required. It allow RFA on this widget. 
 'fetchedPropertiesToPrefill': It is not required. The properties in the form to prefill. 
 'summarySection': It is required. The summary section to which the input value will be allocated after submission.
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What are other origin key fields that can be used in fetchedPropertiesToPrefill?
AI Assistant for IremboHub.
What UPI do we use to fetch the upi information?
The UPI used to fetch is 4/05/09/01/.* . The star * sign as the end marks that you can add any number in that position. Forexample we can have 4/05/09/01/1 4/05/09/01/2 4/05/09/01/3 and more.
